channel.title: Cyber-Warfare on Vyshak Haridasan

item.title: Cyber Frontlines - How the Iran War Is Reshaping Global Cybersecurity
item.description: Recent escalations in the Iran war have turned cyberspace into a pivotal battlefield, with Israel’s massive cyberattack on February 28, 2026, marking a historic shift. This operation, dubbed part of Operation Roar of the Lion, combined airstrikes with digital strikes that crippled Iran’s infrastructure.
